articles.title: Homeland Security records show 'shocking' use of phone data, ACLU says - POLITICO
articles.description: The civil liberties group released documents showing new details about how agencies had purchased information on people's movements throughout North America.
articles.content:
The American Civil Liberties Union obtained the records from DHS through a lawsuit it filed in 2020. It provided the documents to POLITICO and separately released them to the public on Monday.
The d… [+8267 chars]
